scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.backend: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install: npm install && cd backend && uv sync
scripts.test:integration: cd backend && uv run pytest test_integration
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test --prefix frontend" "cd backend && uv run pytest"
